You're doing a Shinsengumi manga too?! Wow! I'm working on a
novel/manga myself.

As for going to Japan, I'm going there next year, and I'll be in
Osaka, 20 minutes away from Kyoto.

Keep us updated on your work! If there's anything (sketches, etc.),
you've done so far, please show us!

--M.
